- (CPColor *) colorWithAlphaComponent: (CGFloat)  alpha  

Creates and returns a new CPColor instance having color components identical to the current object but having the provided alpha component.

Parameters:
alpha The alpha component (0 ≤ alpha ≤ 1).
Returns:
A new CPColor instance having the provided alpha component.

green: (CGFloat)  green
blue: (CGFloat)  blue
alpha: (CGFloat)  alpha

Parameters:

green The green component (0 ≤ green ≤ 1).
blue The blue component (0 ≤ blue ≤ 1).
alpha The alpha component (0 ≤ alpha ≤ 1).
Returns:
A new CPColor instance initialized with the provided RGBA color components.
